HandlerMethods Class Reference

#include <HandlerMethods.h>

Inheritance diagram for HandlerMethods:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

friend of LSystemServer that servers as a container for the handler methods for each command Goal is to allow a new library of handler methods to be swapped in and out of a particular LSystemServer on the fly (or perhaps with a stop/start)
